name: Brahmastra
special_ability: Destroys any single enemy character instantly.
description: The ultimate celestial weapon created by Lord Brahma, capable of massive destruction.

name: Pashupatastra
special_ability: Deals heavy damage to all enemy characters.
description: A powerful weapon of Lord Shiva that can destroy entire armies.

name: Vajra
special_ability: Ignores enemy defense and deals true damage.
description: The thunderbolt of Lord Indra, striking with unstoppable force.

name: Gada of Bheem
special_ability: Deals extra damage to demon-type characters.
description: Bheem's mighty mace, capable of shattering enemies with a single blow.

name: Chakra of Vishnu
special_ability: Can bypass enemy shields and barriers.
description: The Sudarshana Chakra, a spinning disc of divine energy wielded by Lord Vishnu.

name: Shakti Spear
special_ability: Gains bonus attack if used by a warrior-type character.
description: A divine spear infused with the power of Goddess Durga.

name: Trishul of Mahadev
special_ability: Weakens enemy attack power for two turns.
description: The trident of Lord Shiva, capable of both creation and destruction.

name: Kavach of Karna
special_ability: Reduces all damage taken by 50%.
description: An invincible armor gifted to Karna, making him nearly indestructible.

name: Bow of Arjuna
special_ability: Can attack twice in one turn.
description: The Gandiva bow of Arjuna, unmatched in precision and power.

name: Nandaka Sword
special_ability: Gains extra attack when used against asuras.
description: The celestial sword wielded by Lord Vishnu, shining with divine energy.

name: Sharanga Bow
special_ability: Ignores enemy armor when attacking.
description: The celestial bow wielded by Lord Vishnu, known for its precision and divine energy.

name: Parashu of Parshuram
special_ability: Can be used twice in one turn.
description: The battle axe of Lord Parshuram, capable of cutting through any defense.

name: Kaumodaki Mace
special_ability: Has a chance to stun the enemy.
description: The divine mace wielded by Lord Vishnu, known for its immense strength.

name: Khatvanga Staff
special_ability: Boosts magical abilities when used by sages.
description: A mystical staff associated with ascetics and warriors alike.

name: Brahmashirsha Astra
special_ability: Destroys all enemy troops and reduces battlefield power.
description: An advanced version of Brahmastra, capable of mass destruction.

name: Danda of Yama
special_ability: Instantly removes weakened enemy cards from play.
description: The divine rod of Yama, the god of death, which enforces cosmic justice.

name: Halayudha
special_ability: Can immobilize enemy characters for one turn.
description: The mighty plow weapon wielded by Lord Balarama.

name: Shakti of Indrajit
special_ability: Can only be dodged by divine intervention.
description: A divine spear that once brought Lord Lakshman to his knees in battle.

name: Agneyastra
special_ability: Burns enemy health over time.
description: A fire-based divine weapon that engulfs enemies in flames.

name: Nagastra
special_ability: Has a chance to paralyze enemy movement.
description: A snake-infused celestial weapon that binds enemies in its grasp.
